features.CMS: 01 is a communication satellite envisaged for providing services in Extended-C Band of the frequency spectrum. The Extended-C Band coverage will include Indian mainland, Andaman-Nicobar & Lakshadweep Islands. CMS-01 is the 42nd Communication Satellite of India. SALIENT FEATURES OF CMS-01 Mission Life 7 years Power Generation 1500 W मिशन कालावधि / Mission Life: 7 years प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: PSLV-C50/CMS-01 उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Communication निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Communication कक्षा का प्रकार / Orbit Type: GSO (Geosynchronous Orbit) More Details PSLV-C50/CMS-01 CMS-01 Brochure PDF - 2.86 MB Gallery CMS-01 Update Launch of PSLV-C50/CMS-01 Mission PSLV-C50/CMS-01 Lift off and Onboard camera view
